channel.title: [Delta] Log-In Message [Delta]
channel.description: Hello, once again i need help with somthing delta related, when players log in i want it to say "playername has logged in" but its not working the way i had it... can someone write a code that works for log in messages?

item.title: [Delta] Log-In Message [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

The one that I have is

out.write(0); // no log // if(returnCode == 2 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("_")) // PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has Logged In! There Is Now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " People Online!"; } catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) { // destruct(); return; }

I hope I helped… =/
